bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
nnstreamer-tensorflow requires "tensorflow". However, in our PPA, tensorflow is released as "tensorflow-dev". Options:
Make tensorflow-dev "provides" tensorflow "capabilities" Make nnstreamer-tensorflow "requires" tensorflow OR tensorflow-dev.
This will fix <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer-example/issues/21>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer-example/issues/21</denchmark-link>
CC: @dseuss In long term, we need to add unit-test-cases to prevent regressions of such. (After fixing this, I'll add a backlog for this)

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1204>#1204</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
